statement.p: Qasim is conducting market research on the cost of a private helicopter tour. Qasim has determined that the average cost of a private helicopter tour is 790, and that the distribution of costs is normally distributed with a standard deviation of 79.
a. Find the probability that a single randomly selected consumer spends less than 700 on a private helicopter tour.
b. The cost of the middle 40 of private helicopter tours falls between (round to the nearest dollar):
c. The most expensive 6 of private helicopter tours cost at least how much? (round to the nearest dollar)
